title: On the Wakamatsu tilting conjecture
authors: Kamran Divaani-Aazar, Ali Mahin Fallah and Massoud Tousi
abstract:
Let R be an associative ring with identity. We establish that the generalized
Auslander-Reiten conjecture implies the Wakamatsu tilting conjecture.
Furthermore, we prove that any Wakamatsu tilting R-module of finite projective
dimension that is tensorly faithful is projective. By utilizing this result, we
show the validity of the Wakamatsu tilting conjecture for R in two cases: when
R is a left Artinian local ring or when it is the group ring of a finite group
G over a commutative Artinian ring.
